text: On 30 December 2020, a plane which had members of the newly formed Yemeni government landed at Aden International Airport in the southwest of Yemen. As passengers left the plane, there were explosions and gunfire. 25 people were killed and 110 others injured. ==References== Category:2020s building bombings Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:2020s in Yemen Category:Attacks on airports Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Asia Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s Category:December 2020 events Category:Explosions in 2020 Category:2020 mass shootings in Asia Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in 2020
title: 2020 Aden airport attack
